title: Confusion Matrix
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Detailed breakdown of classification. 
- **Precision**: How many selected items are relevant? (TP / TP+FP).
- **Recall**: How many relevant items are selected? (TP / TP+FN).
- **F1**: Harmonic mean of Precision and Recall.

examples.code:
Spam Filter need High Precision (Don't delete real mail).
Cancer Detection needs High Recall (Don't miss a patient).

exam_notes: Type I vs Type II Error.
